Minister.Text: Minister of Infrastructure, Communities and Intergovernmental Affairs (SI/2015-94)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2002, c. 9, ss. 1 and 2, as enacted by s. 45, in force 12.04.2002 see SI/2002-71; ss. 3 to 5, as enacted by s. 45 of the Canada Fund for Africa Act, as enacted by s. 45, in force 27.06.2002 see SI/2002-101
